definitions.definition: The extent or degree to which something is affordable , as measured by its cost relative to the amount that the purchaser is able to pay.
examples: First-time home buyers are feeling the squeeze of higher interest rates with mortgage affordability at its worst level for 16 years.

definitions.definition: A desirable degree of that characteristic: synonym of inexpensiveness .

main_definition: The extent or degree to which something is affordable , as measured by its cost relative to the amount that the purchaser is able to pay.
secondary_definitions: A desirable degree of that characteristic: synonym of inexpensiveness .
